column2: The Mughals will invade at arround the year 1000.
The Mughals will invade at a random date, though at the earliest 50 years after the game is started.
The Mughals will invade at a random date, though at the earliest at the year 1000, and 50 years after the game has started.
The Mughals will not spawn and invade India.
The Mughals will invade instantly at the first month passed.

The Umayyads will invade at a random date, though at the earliest 50 years after the game is started.
The Umayyads will invade at a random date, though at the earliest at the year 1000, and 50 years after the game has started.
The Umayyads will not spawn and invade Spain.
The Umayyads will invade instantly at the first month passed.
